title: MD
biography: Unnikrishnan Bhaskaran Pillai, known mononymously as B Unnikrishnan, is an Indian film director, screenwriter, distributor and exhibitor who works in the Malayalam film industry.
aiSummary: A. G. Unnikrishnan is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 134 at Thyroid research (Member). Has been published in Polymer Engineering and Science, Composites Science and Technology, Progress in Polymer Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
